Santos.line: Bax, mate, did you take my gun?
Hilda! Reckon you know where my gun is?
Ay, you two! Do any o' yous bludgers know where's my gun?

Baxter.line: Your gun...? No, certainly not. Why do you ask? Are you looking for it?

Hilda.line: ...What? No, I don't. Why do you need it?

Narrator.line: For a moment, Santos remained silent.

Santos.line: I... Listen, I was bloody looking for some'ing else, alright? Important part is, MY GUN IS GONE. Someone took it!

Hilda.line: Fucking hell, by the seas, Santos! I can't go on a mad chase after your gun right now. You better take care of this, and fast - I don't want anyone touching down with a hole on the middle of the chest!

Baxter.line: ...Darn. I believe I know where it is. Let me deal with it, alright?
